00010 EagleDbTableData* EagleDbTableData_New(EagleDbTable *table, int pageSize)
00011 {
00012     int i;
00013     EagleDbTableData *td;
00014     
00015     if(NULL == table) {
00016         return NULL;
00017     }
00018     
00019     td = (EagleDbTableData*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTableData_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbTableData));
00020     if(NULL == td) {
00021         return NULL;
00022     }
00023     
00024     td->table = table;
00025     td->usedProviders = EagleDbTable_countColumns(table);
00026     if(td->usedProviders > 0) {
00027         td->providers = (EaglePageProvider**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbTableData_New.2",
00028             sizeof(EaglePageProvider*), td->usedProviders);
00029         if(NULL == td->providers) {
00030             EagleMemory_Free(td);
00031             return NULL;
00032         }
00033     }
00034     else {
00035         td->providers = NULL;
00036     }
00037     
00038     for(i = 0; i < td->usedProviders; ++i) {
00039         EagleDbColumn *column = EagleDbTable_getColumn(table, i);
00040         td->providers[i] = (EaglePageProvider*) EaglePageProviderStream_New(column->type, pageSize, column->name);
00041     }
00042     
00043     return td;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void EagleDbTableData_Delete(EagleDbTableData *td)
00047 {
00048     if(NULL == td) {
00049         return;
00050     }
00051     
00052     {
00053         int i;
00054         for(i = 0; i < td->usedProviders; ++i) {
00055             EaglePageProvider_Delete(td->providers[i]);
00056         }
00057         EagleMemory_Free(td->providers);
00058         EagleMemory_Free(td);
00059     }
00060 }
00061 
00062 void EagleDbTableData_insert(EagleDbTableData *td, EagleDbTuple *tuple)
00063 {
00064     int i;
00065     for(i = 0; i < EagleLinkedList_length(td->table->columns); ++i) {
00066         switch(td->providers[i]->type) {
00067                 
00068             case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00069                 EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Unknown type.");
00070                 return;
00071                 
00072             case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00073                 EaglePageProvider_add(td->providers[i], tuple->data[i]);
00074                 break;
00075                 
00076             case EagleDataTypeVarchar:
00077                 EaglePageProvider_add(td->providers[i], strdup(tuple->data[i]));
00078                 break;
00079                 
00080             case EagleDataTypeFloat:
00081                 EaglePageProvider_add(td->providers[i], tuple->data[i]);
00082                 break;
00083                 
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
